verses.name: Nehemiah 7:44
verses.text: The singers: the children of Asaph, an hundred forty and eight.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:45
verses.text: The porters: the children of Shallum, the children of Ater, the children of Talmon, the children of Akkub, the children of Hatita, the children of Shobai, an hundred thirty and eight.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:46
verses.text: The Nethinims: the children of Ziha, the children of Hashupha, the children of Tabbaoth,

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:47
verses.text: The children of Keros, the children of Sia, the children of Padon,

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:48
verses.text: The children of Lebana, the children of Hagaba, the children of Shalmai,

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:49
verses.text: The children of Hanan, the children of Giddel, the children of Gahar,
